index.content: index → int (Read Only): The vertex position in its primitive.

owner.content: owner → OP (Read Only): The OP to which this object belongs.

point.content: point → td.Point : Get or set the point to which the vertex refers.

prim.content: prim → td.Prim (Read Only): The prim to which the vertex belongs.

Attributes.title: Attributes
Attributes.content: [edit] In addition to the above members, all attributes are members as well. For example, if the Vertex contains texture coordinates, they may be accessed with: Vertex.uv See: Attribute Class for more information.
